declarations.text: I am fearless because God fights for me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror through Christ, and I overcome every challenge!
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: I speak with wisdom and courage, for God fills my mouth with words!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I will give you words and wisdom that none of your adversaries will be able to resist or contradict.

declarations.text: Gods favor is upon me, and I walk in divine boldness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: I am a light to the world, and I shine with courage and faith!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord completely, and He makes my path straight!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

declarations.text: I stand firm in faith, knowing that God is my rock and my foundation!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly he is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will never be shaken.

declarations.text: God is my faithful shield; I trust Him completely, and He guards me day and night.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge.

declarations.text: The Lord is my Keeper; I rest safely, trusting His unfailing protection over my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will keep you from all harm he will watch over your life.

declarations.text: I am safe and secure; God is my faithful refuge, and I trust Him to shield me always.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

declarations.text: God surrounds me with protection; I trust Him fully, and no harm can touch me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No harm will overtake you, no disaster will come near your tent.

declarations.text: The Lord is my strong tower; I run to Him and am completely safe every moment.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The name of the Lord is a fortified tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.

declarations.text: I am hidden in Gods protection; I trust His promises, and He guards every step I take.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will command his angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways.

declarations.text: The Lord is my rock and fortress; I trust in Him, and He shields me from every attack.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer.

declarations.text: Gods faithfulness is my armor; I trust in Him, and no weapon formed against me can prosper.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No weapon forged against you will prevail, and you will refute every tongue that accuses you.

declarations.text: I am guarded on every side; I trust my Keeper, who never slumbers nor sleeps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He who watches over Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.

declarations.text: The Lord is my shield; I trust Him fully, and His protection covers me like armor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you, Lord, are a shield around me, my glory, the One who lifts my head high.

declarations.text: God keeps me safe always; I trust His faithfulness to guard my mind, body, and spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: I am hidden under Gods mighty hand; my trust is in His keeping power, and I fear nothing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: The Lord faithfully watches over me; I trust Him to guard me from seen and unseen dangers.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.

declarations.text: Gods protection never fails; I put my full trust in Him, and He keeps me secure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him.

declarations.text: I am wrapped in divine safety; I trust God to surround me with His mighty protection.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.

declarations.text: Gods hand shields me daily; I trust Him to block every scheme of the enemy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is faithful to all his promises and loving toward all he has made.

declarations.text: The Lord secures my path; I trust His guidance and know He protects my every move.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord makes firm the steps of the one who delights in him.

declarations.text: I dwell safely under Gods wings; I trust His faithful love to guard my life completely.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep me as the apple of your eye; hide me in the shadow of your wings.

declarations.text: God shields my life; I trust His Word and live under the shadow of His protection.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.

declarations.text: I am confident and safe; I trust Gods mighty power to guard me against all harm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my defense; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: The Lord is my sure defense; I trust His faithfulness, and no evil can prevail against me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.

declarations.text: Gods eyes are always on me; I trust His constant care to keep me safe and secure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The eyes of the Lord are on the righteous, and his ears are attentive to their cry.

declarations.text: I am untouchable under Gods covering; I trust Him fully, and He guards my every step.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He guards the course of the just and protects the way of his faithful ones.

declarations.text: My safety is secured by Gods faithfulness; I trust Him completely to keep me unharmed.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The angel of the Lord encamps around those who fear him, and he delivers them.

declarations.text: Gods covering is over me always; I trust His Word, and His protection never fails.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.

declarations.text: I dwell in the secret place of the Most High, and I am covered by His protection!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.

declarations.text: No weapon formed against me shall prosper, for God is my shield!
declarations.bibleVerseText: No weapon formed against you shall prosper, and you will refute every tongue that accuses you.

declarations.text: The Lord is my refuge and fortress, and I am safe in Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my refuge and my fortress, my God, in whom I trust.

declarations.text: God commands His angels concerning me, and I am guarded in all my ways!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For he will command his angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways.

declarations.text: I am surrounded by Gods heavenly army, and I will not be afraid!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The angel of the Lord encamps around those who fear him, and he delivers them.

declarations.text: God is my hiding place, and He preserves me from trouble!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.

declarations.text: I walk in divine safety, and Gods hand upholds me daily!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will keep you from all harm he will watch over your life.

declarations.text: Though thousands may fall around me, no harm will come near me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: A thousand may fall at your side, ten thousand at your right hand, but it will not come near you.

declarations.text: The Lord watches over my coming and going, now and forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.

declarations.text: God is my rock and fortress, and I will not be shaken!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly he is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will never be shaken.

declarations.text: I am hidden in Christ, and no harm can reach me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you died, and your life is now hidden with Christ in God.

declarations.text: God is a shield around me, and His glory lifts me up!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you, Lord, are a shield around me, my glory, the One who lifts my head high.

declarations.text: I sleep in peace, for the Lord watches over me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: In peace I will lie down and sleep, for you alone, Lord, make me dwell in safety.

declarations.text: God goes before me and clears my path of danger!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.

declarations.text: I take refuge in the Lord, and He shields me from harm!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Every word of God is flawless; he is a shield to those who take refuge in him.

declarations.text: I am safe in Gods hands, and nothing can snatch me away!
declarations.bibleVerseText: No one can snatch them out of my Fathers hand.

declarations.text: God protects me from every scheme of the enemy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will rescue me from every evil attack and will bring me safely to his heavenly kingdom.

declarations.text: The name of the Lord is my strong tower, and I run to Him for safety!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The name of the Lord is a fortified tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.

declarations.text: I stand firm in Gods promises, knowing I am always under His protection!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: I am hidden in Gods love, and He shelters me from every storm!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are my refuge and my shield; I have put my hope in your word.

declarations.text: Gods hand is upon me, and He leads me in safety!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You hem me in behind and before, and you lay your hand upon me.

declarations.text: God surrounds me with peace, and I dwell securely in His presence!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gives strength to his people; the Lord blesses his people with peace.

declarations.text: The Lord delivers me from every trouble, and I walk in victory!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous person may have many troubles, but the Lord delivers him from them all.

declarations.text: The Lord watches over my coming and going, now and forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.

declarations.text: A thousand may fall around me, but no evil will touch me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: A thousand may fall at your side, ten thousand at your right hand, but it will not come near you.

declarations.text: The Lord rescues me from every evil attack and brings me to safety!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will rescue me from every evil attack and will bring me safely to his heavenly kingdom.

declarations.text: I sleep in peace, for the Lord keeps me safe!
declarations.bibleVerseText: In peace I will lie down and sleep, for you alone, Lord, make me dwell in safety.

declarations.text: I fear no evil, for Gods rod and staff comfort and guide me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.

declarations.text: The Lord upholds me, and I will not be shaken!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord makes firm the steps of the one who delights in him.

declarations.text: The Lord strengthens and protects me from all harm!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: God encamps around me, and I am shielded by His presence!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The angel of the Lord encamps around those who fear him, and he delivers them.

declarations.text: I have perfect peace now; I reject anxious thoughts and fill my mind with Gods unshakable truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.

declarations.text: My peace is complete; every fearful thought is replaced by Gods victorious promises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take captive every thought to make it obedient to Christ.

declarations.text: I am filled with Gods peace; I reject every lie and renew my mind with His Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not conform to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.

declarations.text: I walk in unbreakable peace; when fear whispers, I crush it with Gods truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and a sound mind.

declarations.text: I am grounded in peace; every negative thought is evicted by the power of Gods Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts.

declarations.text: My heart stays in peace; I reject turmoil and flood my mind with Gods promises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The mind governed by the Spirit is life and peace.

declarations.text: I live in divine calm; every worry is dismantled by the truth of Gods faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

declarations.text: Peace is my present reality; I refuse anxious thoughts and speak Gods promises instead.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

declarations.text: I have Gods peace fully; I guard my mind by replacing lies with His eternal truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fix your thoughts on what is true, and honorable, and right, and pure, and lovely, and admirable.

declarations.text: I am secure in peace; every doubt is destroyed by Gods faithful Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gives strength to his people; the Lord blesses his people with peace.

declarations.text: My peace is anchored; I crush every lie of fear with the sword of the Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take... the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.

declarations.text: I stay in peace continually; every anxious whisper is silenced by Gods Word in my mouth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.

declarations.text: I am rooted in peace; thoughts of fear have no place because Gods truth reigns in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The weapons we fight with... have divine power to demolish strongholds.

declarations.text: My mind is fortified with peace; every negative thought is defeated by Gods faithful promises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away.

declarations.text: I am covered in peace; when anxiety strikes, I instantly replace it with Gods truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations.

declarations.text: I possess Gods perfect peace; every lie of fear dissolves as I stand on His Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my light and my salvation whom shall I fear?

declarations.text: My heart is locked in peace; every anxious thought is replaced with Gods unfailing truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When anxiety was great within me, your consolation brought me joy.

declarations.text: I remain in peace always; I actively reject fear and declare Gods promises with boldness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Say to those with fearful hearts, 'Be strong, do not fear; your God will come.'

declarations.text: I live in complete peace; every thought of worry is replaced with God's rock-solid truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.

declarations.text: My peace is unstoppable; I guard my mind by speaking Gods promises louder than any fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.

declarations.text: I am still before the Lord, and He fights my battles for me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: I cast all my burdens on the Lord, and He sustains me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

declarations.text: God gives me rest, and my soul is restored in His presence!
declarations.bibleVerseText: He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters, he refreshes my soul.

declarations.text: I wait on the Lord, and He renews my strength!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles.

declarations.text: God quiets my heart and fills me with His perfect peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be still, and know that I am God.

declarations.text: I enter into God's rest, and my soul finds true peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: There remains, then, a Sabbath-rest for the people of God.

declarations.text: I surrender my worries, and God fills me with His perfect rest!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: I am safe in Gods presence, and my heart is at peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I lack nothing.

declarations.text: God quiets my soul and fills me with His peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly my soul finds rest in God; my salvation comes from him.

declarations.text: Gods presence goes with me, and I find rest in Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: God strengthens my soul, and I am refreshed in His love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves. He will take great delight in you; in his love he will no longer rebuke you but will rejoice over you with singing.

declarations.text: I release all stress, and God fills me with His peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: God orchestrates my life perfectly, and I walk in His divine order!
declarations.bibleVerseText: He has made everything beautiful in its time.

declarations.text: I release my burdens to Jesus, and He fills my heart with peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.

declarations.text: God's peace calms every storm in my life, and I remain steadfast!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.

declarations.text: I walk confidently in Gods direction, and He leads me every step!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.

declarations.text: The strength of the Lord lifts me higher each day!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles.

declarations.text: I release my worries and trust God to handle every situation!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

declarations.text: The presence of Jesus restores my soul completely!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: God is my shelter, and under His wings, I find security!
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge.

declarations.text: I rest in the stillness of God, knowing He is in control!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be still, and know that I am God.

declarations.text: God fills my life with joy and guides me on the path of righteousness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You make known to me the path of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence.

declarations.text: Gods peace surrounds my heart, and I trust Him fully!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: Gods presence is my refuge, and I dwell in His safety!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly my soul finds rest in God; my salvation comes from him.

declarations.text: God daily lifts my burdens, and I walk in His peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise be to the Lord, to God our Savior, who daily bears our burdens.

declarations.text: Each morning, I am renewed by Gods never-ending love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning.

declarations.text: God fills my home and heart with His unshakable peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My people will live in peaceful dwelling places, in secure homes, in undisturbed places of rest.

declarations.text: I choose joy daily, for God's goodness never fails!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The joy of the Lord is your strength.

declarations.text: I am grateful in every season, knowing Gods plan is perfect!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is Gods will for you in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: God strengthens my hope, and I rejoice in His promises!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.

declarations.text: I choose joy in trials, for I know God is working in me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Consider it pure joy, my brothers and sisters, whenever you face trials of many kinds.

declarations.text: God fills my soul with peace and abundant joy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him.

declarations.text: My heart sings of Gods goodness every day!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My lips will shout for joy when I sing praise to you I whom you have delivered.

declarations.text: I wear a garment of praise, and joy fills my life!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The oil of joy instead of mourning, and a garment of praise instead of a spirit of despair.

declarations.text: I celebrate each new day as a gift from God!
declarations.bibleVerseText: This is the day the Lord has made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.

declarations.text: In every trial, I praise God, for my joy is found in Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Though you have not seen him, you love him; and even though you do not see him now, you believe in him and are filled with an inexpressible and glorious joy.

declarations.text: My joy overflows because Gods love fills my heart!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You make known to me the path of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence.

declarations.text: I rejoice in the Lord always, and my heart is steadfast in Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!

declarations.text: My sorrow turns into joy, for God is my Redeemer!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You turned my wailing into dancing; you removed my sackcloth and clothed me with joy.

declarations.text: Gods joy is my inheritance, and I live in His gladness daily!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have made known to me the paths of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence.

declarations.text: I am filled with the joy of the Lord, and no trial can steal it!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have told you this so that my joy may be in you and that your joy may be complete.

declarations.text: My heart is joyful because I trust in Gods unfailing love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My heart leaps for joy, and with my song I praise him.

declarations.text: I find strength in worship, and my spirit rejoices in God!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My soul glorifies the Lord and my spirit rejoices in God my Savior.

declarations.text: My joy comes from the Lord, and it is unshakable!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Yet I will rejoice in the Lord, I will be joyful in God my Savior.

declarations.text: I rejoice because I know that God is working all things for my good!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him.

declarations.text: God fills me with joy, and His love sustains me through all seasons!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord has done great things for us, and we are filled with joy.

declarations.text: My soul delights in the Lord, and He fills my life with blessings!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Delight yourself in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.

declarations.text: Gods joy strengthens me, and I am victorious in Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The joy of the Lord is your strength.

declarations.text: I walk in joy daily because my trust is in the Lords promises!
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him.

declarations.text: Gods faithfulness fills me with joy, and my spirit sings His praises!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will give thanks to you, Lord, with all my heart; I will tell of all your wonderful deeds.

declarations.text: I live in joyful expectation, knowing Gods plans for me are good!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

declarations.text: I am filled with joy, for God surrounds me with His love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good; his love endures forever.

declarations.text: The Lord restores my joy and turns my mourning into gladness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Weeping may stay for the night, but rejoicing comes in the morning.

declarations.text: I am filled with the joy of salvation, and I rejoice in the Lord!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Restore to me the joy of your salvation and grant me a willing spirit, to sustain me.

declarations.text: My spirit is lifted as I celebrate the goodness of God!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise the Lord. Blessed are those who fear the Lord, who find great delight in his commands.

declarations.text: I am anointed with the oil of joy, and my life radiates gladness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have loved righteousness and hated wickedness; therefore God, your God, has set you above your companions by anointing you with the oil of joy.

declarations.text: I give thanks to God in every situation, and He fills me with joy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is Gods will for you in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I rejoice in the Lord, and His joy sustains me through every season!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have told you this so that my joy may be in you and that your joy may be complete.

declarations.text: I celebrate every blessing, for my life is filled with Gods goodness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: From the fullness of his grace we have all received one blessing after another.

declarations.text: The Lords joy is my inheritance, and I walk in His gladness daily!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have made known to me the paths of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence.

declarations.text: The Lord is my comforter, and He heals my heart in every season.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.

declarations.text: God is near to me in my sorrow, and His love restores my soul.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.

declarations.text: I will not be shaken, for God is my rock and my foundation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

declarations.text: Even in trials, I stand firm, knowing that Gods purpose prevails in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him.

declarations.text: The Lord renews my strength daily, and I walk in His power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles.

declarations.text: I am never alone, for the Lord holds my hand and guides my steps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me.

declarations.text: I cast my burdens on the Lord, and His peace fills my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

declarations.text: God strengthens me in my weakness, and His power flows through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.

declarations.text: I will not grow weary in faith, for God renews my endurance daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us not grow weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.

declarations.text: I have peace in every storm, for my trust is in Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.

declarations.text: God is faithful, and He gives me the strength to overcome every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No temptation has overtaken you except what is common to mankind. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear.

declarations.text: I am victorious through Christ, and no difficulty can defeat me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: The Lord carries me when I am weak, and He lifts me up in His strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.

declarations.text: I endure hardships with faith, knowing God is shaping me for greater things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Consider it pure joy, my brothers and sisters, whenever you face trials of many kinds, because you know that the testing of your faith produces perseverance.

declarations.text: I take refuge in the Lord, and His love surrounds me like a shield.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is a refuge for the oppressed, a stronghold in times of trouble.

declarations.text: The Lord will restore my joy, and I will dance again in His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You turned my wailing into dancing; you removed my sackcloth and clothed me with joy.

declarations.text: God wipes away my tears, and He fills my heart with hope again.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Those who sow with tears will reap with songs of joy.

declarations.text: Gods strength empowers me to keep moving forward with faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my light and my salvation whom shall I fear?

declarations.text: I endure trials with unwavering faith, for Christ is my firm foundation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We have this hope as an anchor for the soul, firm and secure.

declarations.text: God walks with me through deep waters, and His peace sustains me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When you pass through the waters, I will be with you; and when you pass through the rivers, they will not sweep over you.

declarations.text: I will rise again, for the Lord lifts me up and gives me new strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Though he may stumble, he will not fall, for the Lord upholds him with his hand.

declarations.text: I will not be afraid, for the Lord goes before me and makes my path clear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So we say with confidence, 'The Lord is my helper; I will not be afraid.'

declarations.text: I am victorious because God is my fortress, and He fights for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge.

declarations.text: I take heart, for Jesus is my peace in every storm!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.

declarations.text: I run my race with endurance, knowing God has set my path before me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us, fixing our eyes on Jesus, the pioneer and perfecter of faith.

declarations.text: God is my refuge and my strength, and I stand firm in faith!
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

declarations.text: The Lord is my foundation, and I will not be shaken!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge.

declarations.text: God strengthens me for every battle, and I walk in His victory!
declarations.bibleVerseText: It is God who arms me with strength and keeps my way secure.

declarations.text: The Lord fights for me, and I walk forward in faith!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: Gods perfect love casts out all fear, and I live in His boldness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.

declarations.text: My hope is in Christ, and I stand secure in His promises!
declarations.bibleVerseText: We have this hope as an anchor for the soul, firm and secure.

declarations.text: I press forward in faith, knowing that my reward is sure!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us not grow weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.

declarations.text: God strengthens me through trials, and I receive His crown of life!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who perseveres under trial because, having stood the test, that person will receive the crown of life that the Lord has promised to those who love him.

declarations.text: The Lord orders my steps, and I walk in His wisdom and favor!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord makes firm the steps of the one who delights in him.

declarations.text: Gods grace empowers me, and His strength is my confidence!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'

declarations.text: My children grow in the wisdom and knowledge of the Lord daily!
declarations.bibleVerseText: All your children will be taught by the Lord, and great will be their peace.

declarations.text: The Lord commands His angels concerning my children, and they are protected!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For he will command his angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways.

declarations.text: I speak Gods truth over my children, and they fulfill their destiny!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The tongue has the power of life and death, and those who love it will eat its fruit.

declarations.text: My children are a precious gift from God, and they are filled with His joy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Children are a heritage from the Lord, offspring a reward from him.

declarations.text: My children stand firm in faith and walk in Gods courage!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be on your guard; stand firm in the faith; be courageous; be strong.

declarations.text: I train my children in the truth, and they will never depart from it!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Start children off on the way they should go, and even when they are old they will not turn from it.

declarations.text: My children walk in wisdom and understanding, led by the Spirit!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom, and knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.

declarations.text: The favor of the Lord is upon my children, and they grow in His grace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And Jesus grew in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and man.

declarations.text: My children are covered by Gods peace, and they rest in His love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.

declarations.text: I declare my children will walk with the Lord all their days!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But as for me and my household, we will serve the Lord.

declarations.text: No weapon formed against my children shall prosper, for they are covered by the blood of Jesus!
declarations.bibleVerseText: No weapon formed against you shall prosper, and you will refute every tongue that accuses you.

declarations.text: My children bring joy to the Lord, for they walk in righteousness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The father of a righteous child has great joy; a man who fathers a wise son rejoices in him.

declarations.text: Gods purpose for my children is good, filled with hope and a future!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

declarations.text: My children walk in truth, guided by the Holy Spirit and Gods Word!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children are walking in the truth.

declarations.text: I raise my children in love and truth, and they will flourish in Gods kingdom!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: God grants me wisdom and patience to raise my children in His ways!
declarations.bibleVerseText: If any of you lacks wisdom, you should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to you.

declarations.text: The Lord directs my steps in parenting, and I trust His perfect guidance!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

declarations.text: I am patient and kind in raising my children, reflecting Gods love to them!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love is patient, love is kind.

declarations.text: God gives me discernment to train my children in the way they should go!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Start children off on the way they should go, and even when they are old they will not turn from it.

declarations.text: The Lord blesses my children with wisdom, and they grow in His grace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding.

declarations.text: Gods peace fills my home, and my children are raised in a place of love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My people will live in peaceful dwelling places, in secure homes, in undisturbed places of rest.

declarations.text: I rely on Gods strength, and He equips me to raise my children well!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.

declarations.text: The Lord establishes my childrens steps, and they walk in His ways!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord makes firm the steps of the one who delights in him.

declarations.text: My children are protected by the Lord, and no harm will come near them!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will keep you from all harm he will watch over your life.

declarations.text: I speak life over my children, and they flourish under Gods care!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The tongue has the power of life and death, and those who love it will eat its fruit.

declarations.text: The Holy Spirit leads me in wisdom as I parent my children with love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For those who are led by the Spirit of God are the children of God.

declarations.text: My children grow in wisdom, stature, and favor before God and man!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And Jesus grew in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and man.

declarations.text: I am clothed with strength and dignity as I raise my children in faith!
declarations.bibleVerseText: She is clothed with strength and dignity; she can laugh at the days to come.

declarations.text: My childrens hearts are open to God, and they walk in His truth!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children are walking in the truth.

declarations.text: The Lord surrounds my children with favor and protects their path!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: My home is filled with Gods love, and my children are nurtured in peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let all that you do be done in love.

declarations.text: I lead my children with wisdom, and they walk in paths of righteousness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The wise in heart are called discerning, and gracious words promote instruction.

declarations.text: Gods grace strengthens me as I parent with patience and love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'

declarations.text: The Lord is my helper, and He guides me in every decision for my children!
declarations.bibleVerseText: So we say with confidence, 'The Lord is my helper; I will not be afraid.'

declarations.text: I teach my children Gods Word, and His truth remains in their hearts!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Impress them on your children. Talk about them when you sit at home and when you walk along the road.

declarations.text: I trust God to protect, guide, and bless my children daily!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.

declarations.text: I raise my children with faith, knowing Gods plans for them are good!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

declarations.text: My children are covered in Gods protection, and they walk in divine safety!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For he will command his angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways.

declarations.text: I walk in Gods wisdom as I teach and guide my children in faith!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding.

declarations.text: You are a new creation in Me. The old has passed away, and all things have become new.
I have called you My beloved. You are chosen, set apart, and deeply loved.
You are seated with Me in heavenly places, far above every power, principality, and fear.
I have given you My righteousness. You are holy, blameless, and without fault in My sight.
You are the light of the world, a city on a hill that cannot be hidden. Shine brightly, for I am with you.
You are more than a conqueror through My love. Nothing can stand against you when you stand in Me.
You are My workmanship, created for great works that I prepared for you before time began.
I have given you My Spirit. You walk in power, authority, and victory over every challenge.
You are no longer a slave to fear, sin, or doubt. You are My child, and My Spirit lives in you.
You wear My name, and My glory rests upon you. Walk boldly, for you carry My presence wherever you go.
I am chosen by God, set apart for His purpose, and dearly loved!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, Gods special possession, that you may declare the praises of him who called you out of darkness into his wonderful light.

declarations.text: I am fearfully and wonderfully made, and Gods masterpiece!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.

declarations.text: I am a child of God, deeply loved and fully accepted!
declarations.bibleVerseText: See what great love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God!

declarations.text: I have been set apart for Gods divine purpose, and I walk in His calling!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations.

declarations.text: I am a new creation in Christ, and my past no longer defines me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!

declarations.text: I am seated in heavenly places with Christ, reigning in His authority!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God raised us up with Christ and seated us with him in the heavenly realms in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I am the righteousness of God in Christ, walking in His holiness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: God made him who had no sin to be sin for us, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.

declarations.text: I am Gods workmanship, created for good works and great impact!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we are Gods handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

declarations.text: I am dearly loved, and nothing can separate me from Gods love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Neither height nor depth, nor anything else in all creation, will be able to separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

declarations.text: I am light in the Lord, shining brightly in a dark world!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you were once darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Live as children of light.

declarations.text: I am a citizen of heaven, and my home is with Christ for eternity!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But our citizenship is in heaven. And we eagerly await a Savior from there, the Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I am redeemed by the blood of Jesus and walk in divine favor!
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of Gods grace.

declarations.text: I am victorious in Christ, and nothing can defeat me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But thanks be to God! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I have the mind of Christ, and I think with wisdom and clarity!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But we have the mind of Christ.

declarations.text: I am an ambassador of Christ, representing His kingdom with boldness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: We are therefore Christs ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us.

declarations.text: I am part of Gods royal family, chosen to reign with Christ!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit himself testifies with our spirit that we are Gods children.

declarations.text: I am blessed and highly favored, walking in Gods abundant love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous, for the Lord is always with me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.

declarations.text: I am called, justified, and glorified by Gods grace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And those he predestined, he also called; those he called, he also justified; those he justified, he also glorified.

declarations.text: I am the salt of the earth, adding divine flavor to the world!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt loses its saltiness, how can it be made salty again?

declarations.text: I am crowned with glory and honor, made in Gods image!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have made them a little lower than the angels and crowned them with glory and honor.

declarations.text: I am a temple of the Holy Spirit, filled with Gods presence!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God?

declarations.text: I am a child of God, chosen and dearly loved!
declarations.bibleVerseText: See what great love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God!

declarations.text: I am created in God's image and reflect His glory!
declarations.bibleVerseText: So God created mankind in his own image, in the image of God he created them; male and female he created them.

declarations.text: I am fearfully and wonderfully made by Gods perfect design!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.

declarations.text: I am a new creation in Christ, and my past no longer defines me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!

declarations.text: I am chosen, royal, and set apart for Gods divine purpose!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, Gods special possession.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror through Christ who loves me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: I have been given authority in Christ to overcome all obstacles!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have given you authority to trample on snakes and scorpions and to overcome all the power of the enemy; nothing will harm you.

declarations.text: I am the righteousness of God in Christ, holy and blameless before Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: God made him who had no sin to be sin for us, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.

declarations.text: I am God's masterpiece, created for good works and divine impact!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we are Gods handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

declarations.text: I am the light of the world, shining brightly with Gods truth and love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.

declarations.text: I am a citizen of heaven, seated with Christ in heavenly places!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But our citizenship is in heaven. And we eagerly await a Savior from there, the Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I am deeply loved by God, and nothing can separate me from His love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Neither height nor depth, nor anything else in all creation, will be able to separate us from the love of God.

declarations.text: I am filled with the Holy Spirit and walk in supernatural power!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you.

declarations.text: I am crowned with glory and honor, made for Gods purpose!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have made them a little lower than the angels and crowned them with glory and honor.

declarations.text: I am Gods temple, and His Spirit dwells within me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit, who is in you?

declarations.text: I am the salt of the earth, preserving and bringing Gods flavor to the world!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the salt of the earth.

declarations.text: I have the mind of Christ and walk in divine wisdom and understanding!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But we have the mind of Christ.

declarations.text: I am Gods ambassador, carrying His message to the world with boldness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: We are therefore Christs ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us.

declarations.text: I am called, justified, and glorified by Gods grace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And those he predestined, he also called; those he called, he also justified; those he justified, he also glorified.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous because God is always with me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.

declarations.text: I am covered by Gods favor, and He surrounds me like a shield!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: I am destined for greatness, and Gods plans for me are filled with hope!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

declarations.text: I am filled with confidence, for God goes before me and fights for me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.

declarations.text: My marriage is built on Gods love, and nothing can shake it!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Unless the Lord builds the house, the builders labor in vain.

declarations.text: Gods love flows through my marriage, making it strong and unbreakable!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love never fails.

declarations.text: My spouse and I are one in Christ, walking in unity and peace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: So they are no longer two, but one flesh. Therefore what God has joined together, let no one separate.

declarations.text: God fills my marriage with grace, patience, and unconditional love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.

declarations.text: My spouse and I love each other deeply, just as Christ loves us!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her.

declarations.text: God blesses my marriage with joy, passion, and faithfulness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: May your fountain be blessed, and may you rejoice in the wife of your youth.

declarations.text: I am patient and kind with my spouse, reflecting Gods love daily!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.

declarations.text: My marriage is filled with Gods peace, and we overcome every challenge together!
declarations.bibleVerseText: If God is for us, who can be against us?

declarations.text: The Holy Spirit guides my spouse and me, drawing us closer to God and each other!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Though one may be overpowered, two can defend themselves. A cord of three strands is not quickly broken.

declarations.text: I speak life over my marriage, and it flourishes in Gods presence!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The tongue has the power of life and death, and those who love it will eat its fruit.

declarations.text: Gods love in my marriage conquers all fear and doubt!
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.

declarations.text: My spouse and I honor and respect each other as Christ commands!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Submit to one another out of reverence for Christ.

declarations.text: God heals and restores any brokenness in my marriage!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will restore to you the years that the swarming locust has eaten.

declarations.text: My spouse and I forgive quickly and love deeply, just as Christ forgives us!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bear with each other and forgive one another if any of you has a grievance against someone. Forgive as the Lord forgave you.

declarations.text: Gods peace rules in my home, and our love grows stronger every day!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.

declarations.text: I am faithful to my spouse, and our marriage is built on trust and love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Marriage should be honored by all, and the marriage bed kept pure.

declarations.text: My marriage is a testimony of Gods goodness and grace!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we are Gods handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works.

declarations.text: God blesses my marriage with wisdom, understanding, and unity!
declarations.bibleVerseText: By wisdom a house is built, and through understanding it is established.

declarations.text: My spouse and I seek God first, and He aligns our hearts in love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

declarations.text: Our marriage is a reflection of Christs love, and we serve each other with joy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever wants to become great among you must be your servant.

declarations.text: My marriage is full of laughter, love, and divine joy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

declarations.text: I walk in humility, and my marriage thrives in love and understanding!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do nothing out of selfish ambition or vain conceit. Rather, in humility value others above yourselves.

declarations.text: Gods grace strengthens my marriage, and His love never fails us!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And now these three remain: faith, hope and love. But the greatest of these is love.

declarations.text: I speak blessings over my marriage, and it flourishes in Gods hands!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.

declarations.text: God fills my marriage with love, patience, and understanding!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.

declarations.text: I speak life and love into my marriage daily!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The tongue has the power of life and death, and those who love it will eat its fruit.

declarations.text: God teaches me to love my spouse unconditionally, just as He loves me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her.

declarations.text: My spouse and I treat each other with honor and respect!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be devoted to one another in love. Honor one another above yourselves.

declarations.text: We communicate with kindness and understanding, always building each other up!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not let any unwholesome talk come out of your mouths, but only what is helpful for building others up.

declarations.text: God strengthens our marriage, and we walk together in unity!
declarations.bibleVerseText: How good and pleasant it is when Gods people live together in unity!

declarations.text: My marriage is a covenant, and we keep our vows before God!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore what God has joined together, let no one separate.

declarations.text: We are quick to listen, slow to speak, and slow to become angry!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Everyone should be quick to listen, slow to speak and slow to become angry.

declarations.text: The Lord fills our home with peace, love, and patience!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace.

declarations.text: We bear with each other in love and forgive as Christ forgave us!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bear with each other and forgive one another if any of you has a grievance against someone. Forgive as the Lord forgave you.

declarations.text: Gods grace empowers us to love each other deeply and unselfishly!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.

declarations.text: Gods love in us removes fear, and we trust each other completely!
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.

declarations.text: We choose love, patience, and kindness in every situation!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do everything in love.

declarations.text: Our marriage is strong because we build it on Christ, our firm foundation!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Unless the Lord builds the house, the builders labor in vain.

declarations.text: Gods wisdom leads our marriage, and we grow together in understanding!
declarations.bibleVerseText: By wisdom a house is built, and through understanding it is established.

declarations.text: My spouse and I choose words that bring life and encouragement!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Gracious words are a honeycomb, sweet to the soul and healing to the bones.

declarations.text: We submit to one another in love, honoring Christ in our marriage!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Submit to one another out of reverence for Christ.

declarations.text: Our love never fails because it is rooted in Gods unfailing love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And now these three remain: faith, hope and love. But the greatest of these is love.

declarations.text: We choose peace and understanding over strife and division!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Make every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace.

declarations.text: God blesses our marriage with joy, laughter, and abundant love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

declarations.text: We overcome every challenge together with God at the center!
declarations.bibleVerseText: If God is for us, who can be against us?

declarations.text: God fills our hearts with humility, and we serve one another in love!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do nothing out of selfish ambition or vain conceit. Rather, in humility value others above yourselves.

declarations.text: Gods favor rests on our marriage, and we thrive in His blessings!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.

declarations.text: We walk in unity, love, and respect, reflecting Christs love for the Church!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Though one may be overpowered, two can defend themselves. A cord of three strands is not quickly broken.

declarations.text: I will praise the Lord at all times; His praise will always be on my lips!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will bless the Lord at all times; his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

declarations.text: I rejoice in the Lord always, and His joy strengthens me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!

declarations.text: Even in trials, I lift up my hands and praise the Lord!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Consider it pure joy, my brothers and sisters, whenever you face trials of many kinds.

declarations.text: God inhabits my praises, and His presence fills my life!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Yet you are holy, enthroned on the praises of Israel.

declarations.text: I sing and make music to the Lord with all my heart!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Sing and make music from your heart to the Lord.

declarations.text: My soul glorifies the Lord, and my spirit rejoices in God my Savior!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My soul glorifies the Lord and my spirit rejoices in God my Savior.

declarations.text: I will not be shaken, for my heart is steadfast, trusting in the Lord!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My heart, O God, is steadfast; I will sing and make music with all my soul.

declarations.text: I give thanks in all circumstances, for this is Gods will for me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is Gods will for you in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I will praise the Lord at all times; His praise will never leave my heart!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will extol the Lord at all times; his praise will always be on my lips.

declarations.text: I will declare Gods goodness and His faithfulness in all things!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will sing of the Lords great love forever; with my mouth I will make your faithfulness known through all generations.

declarations.text: I lift my hands in worship, for the Lord is great and greatly to be praised!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.

declarations.text: Even in sorrow, I will praise the Lord and trust in His goodness!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Though he slay me, yet will I hope in him.

declarations.text: I will praise the Lord with all my heart, declaring His marvelous deeds!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will give thanks to you, Lord, with all my heart; I will tell of all your wonderful deeds.

declarations.text: I shout for joy to the Lord, for He has done great things for me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Shout for joy to the Lord, all the earth, burst into jubilant song with music.

declarations.text: I praise God because His love endures forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good; his love endures forever.

declarations.text: I rejoice in suffering, knowing that God is strengthening my faith!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Not only so, but we also glory in our sufferings, because we know that suffering produces perseverance.

declarations.text: I praise the Lord with all that is within me, for He is worthy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise the Lord, my soul; all my inmost being, praise his holy name.

declarations.text: I sing praises to my King, for He reigns forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Sing praises to God, sing praises; sing praises to our King, sing praises.

declarations.text: I will praise God in the storm, for He is my refuge and strength!
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

declarations.text: I exalt the Lord at all times, for He is good and His mercy is everlasting!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Enter his gates with thanksgiving and his courts with praise; give thanks to him and praise his name.

declarations.text: My heart is filled with gratitude, and I will praise the Lord forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will give thanks to the Lord because of his righteousness; I will sing the praises of the name of the Lord Most High.

declarations.text: I lift up my voice in praise, for the Lord is my salvation and song!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my defense; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: My lips will glorify the Lord, for His faithfulness is everlasting!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because your love is better than life, my lips will glorify you.

declarations.text: I worship the Lord with all my heart, for He is great and worthy of praise!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Great is the Lord and most worthy of praise; his greatness no one can fathom.

declarations.text: I lift my hands in worship, for God alone is worthy of my praise!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary and praise the Lord.

declarations.text: I enter His gates with thanksgiving and His courts with praise!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Enter his gates with thanksgiving and his courts with praise; give thanks to him and praise his name.

declarations.text: My heart overflows with thanksgiving, for Gods love never fails!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good; his love endures forever.

declarations.text: I declare Gods mighty works and sing of His goodness daily!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will sing of the Lords great love forever; with my mouth I will make your faithfulness known through all generations.

declarations.text: I worship the Lord in spirit and in truth, for He seeks those who worship Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is spirit, and his worshipers must worship in the Spirit and in truth.

declarations.text: I glorify God in all things, for His power is beyond measure!
declarations.bibleVerseText: To him be the glory and the power for ever and ever. Amen.

declarations.text: I rejoice in the Lord always, for He is my joy and my strength!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!

declarations.text: I give thanks in all circumstances, for this is Gods will for me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is Gods will for you in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I magnify the Lord, for He does great and marvelous things!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My soul glorifies the Lord and my spirit rejoices in God my Savior.

declarations.text: I will praise the Lord at all times, His praise is always on my lips!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will bless the Lord at all times; his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

declarations.text: I sing to the Lord a new song, for He has done marvelous things!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Sing to the Lord a new song, for he has done marvelous things.

declarations.text: I worship God with a heart full of gratitude, for He is my provider!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.

declarations.text: I lift up my voice and declare the greatness of my God!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Sing praises to God, sing praises; sing praises to our King, sing praises.

declarations.text: The Lord is my salvation and my song, and I give Him all my praise!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my defense; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: I am filled with joy as I worship the Lord with all my heart!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Shout for joy to the Lord, all the earth, burst into jubilant song with music.

declarations.text: I lift up my hands in praise, for God reigns forever and ever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will praise you as long as I live, and in your name I will lift up my hands.

declarations.text: I trust in the power of God, and I praise Him for His mighty works!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise him for his acts of power; praise him for his surpassing greatness.

declarations.text: I bow before the Lord in worship, for He alone is worthy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Come, let us bow down in worship, let us kneel before the Lord our Maker.

declarations.text: I exalt the name of the Lord, for His mercy and goodness never end!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations.

declarations.text: My soul is satisfied in the Lord, and I give Him all my praise!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will be fully satisfied as with the richest of foods; with singing lips my mouth will praise you.

declarations.text: I shout for joy and give thanks, for the Lord has done great things!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord has done great things for us, and we are filled with joy.

declarations.text: I glorify God with all my heart, for He is my refuge and strength!
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

declarations.text: My citizenship is in heaven, and I eagerly await my Savior!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But our citizenship is in heaven. And we eagerly await a Savior from there, the Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: Jesus has prepared a place for me, and I will dwell with Him forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Fathers house has many rooms; if that were not so, would I have told you that I am going there to prepare a place for you?

declarations.text: I set my mind on things above, where Christ is seated in glory!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Set your minds on things above, not on earthly things.

declarations.text: God has given me eternal life, and my future is secure in Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And this is the testimony: God has given us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

declarations.text: My hope is anchored in the promise of heaven, and I will not be shaken!
declarations.bibleVerseText: We have this hope as an anchor for the soul, firm and secure.

declarations.text: I will see God face to face, and He will wipe every tear from my eyes!
declarations.bibleVerseText: They will see his face, and his name will be on their foreheads.

declarations.text: No eye has seen the glorious things God has prepared for me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: What no eye has seen, what no ear has heard, and what no human mind has conceived the things God has prepared for those who love him.

declarations.text: I am storing up treasures in heaven, where they last forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But store up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where moths and vermin do not destroy.

declarations.text: I long for Gods presence, for in His presence is fullness of joy!
declarations.bibleVerseText: You make known to me the path of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence, with eternal pleasures at your right hand.

declarations.text: I will reign with Christ in His eternal kingdom forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And they will reign for ever and ever.

declarations.text: I fix my eyes on Jesus, for my reward is with Him in eternity!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And when the Chief Shepherd appears, you will receive the crown of glory that will never fade away.

declarations.text: I belong to the kingdom of heaven, where my true inheritance is stored!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the meek will inherit the land and enjoy peace and prosperity.

declarations.text: My name is written in the Lambs book of life, and I will dwell with God forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire.

declarations.text: I will walk on streets of gold and live in Gods glorious light!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The great street of the city was of gold, as pure as transparent glass.

declarations.text: I will worship before the throne of God forever and ever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Day and night they never stop saying: Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God Almighty, who was, and is, and is to come.

declarations.text: I have eternal life through Jesus, and nothing can take it from me!
declarations.bibleVerseText: I give them eternal life, and they shall never perish; no one will snatch them out of my hand.

declarations.text: I am an heir to Gods kingdom, and my reward is eternal!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now if we are children, then we are heirs heirs of God and co-heirs with Christ.

declarations.text: I am surrounded by a great cloud of witnesses, pressing toward my heavenly prize!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Since we are surrounded by such a great cloud of witnesses, let us throw off everything that hinders.

declarations.text: I look forward to the day when death will be no more, and God makes all things new!
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.

declarations.text: Gods glory will shine over me, and I will live in His everlasting light!
declarations.bibleVerseText: The city does not need the sun or the moon to shine on it, for the glory of God gives it light.

declarations.text: I long for the day when I will see my Savior face to face!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For now we see only a reflection as in a mirror; then we shall see face to face.

declarations.text: I hold fast to the promise that I will be with the Lord forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And so we will be with the Lord forever.

declarations.text: My hope is in Christ, and I will share in His glory forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Christ in you, the hope of glory.

declarations.text: I have an eternal inheritance that will never fade away!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Into an inheritance that can never perish, spoil or fade. This inheritance is kept in heaven for you.

declarations.text: I store up treasures in heaven, where they last forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But store up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where moths and vermin do not destroy.

declarations.text: My reward is great in heaven, for I walk in faith and obedience!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice and be glad, because great is your reward in heaven.

declarations.text: I fix my eyes on the unseen, for my eternal reward is in Christ!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For our light and momentary troubles are achieving for us an eternal glory that far outweighs them all.

declarations.text: I am a citizen of heaven, where my true inheritance awaits!
declarations.bibleVerseText: But our citizenship is in heaven. And we eagerly await a Savior from there.

declarations.text: My life is hidden with Christ, and I will be revealed in His glory!
declarations.bibleVerseText: When Christ, who is your life, appears, then you also will appear with him in glory.

declarations.text: I long for the day I will see Jesus face to face and rejoice in His presence!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For now we see only a reflection as in a mirror; then we shall see face to face.

declarations.text: God has prepared a glorious kingdom for me, and I will reign with Him!
declarations.bibleVerseText: And they will reign for ever and ever.

declarations.text: My hope is secure in Christ, and nothing can take my inheritance away!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Nothing can separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

declarations.text: I set my heart on things above, where Jesus reigns in glory!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Set your hearts on things above, where Christ is, seated at the right hand of God.

declarations.text: I will receive the crown of life, for I stand firm in my faith!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who perseveres under trial because, having stood the test, that person will receive the crown of life.

declarations.text: I have an eternal home with Jesus, where joy will never end!
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Fathers house has many rooms; if that were not so, would I have told you that I am going there to prepare a place for you?

declarations.text: I fix my hope on Jesus, for He is my eternal prize!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us, fixing our eyes on Jesus.

declarations.text: I will inherit the kingdom prepared for me since the beginning of time!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world.

declarations.text: I will shine like the stars forever in the presence of God!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the righteous will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father.

declarations.text: I long for my heavenly home, where Gods glory fills the earth!
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

declarations.text: My name is written in the Lambs book of life, and I belong to Jesus forever!
declarations.bibleVerseText: Anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire.

declarations.text: I will walk in the city of God, where there is no more pain or sorrow!
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.

declarations.text: I will rejoice before God, where eternal joy never ends!
